verses.name: 2 Samuel 2:17
verses.text: And there was a very sore battle that day; and Abner was beaten, and the men of Israel, before the servants of David.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 2:18
verses.text: And there were three sons of Zeruiah there, Joab, and Abishai, and Asahel: and Asahel was as light of foot as a wild roe.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 2:19
verses.text: And Asahel pursued after Abner; and in going he turned not to the right hand nor to the left from following Abner.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 2:20
verses.text: Then Abner looked behind him, and said, Art thou Asahel? And he answered, I am.
